Text is the best.

20 May 2016

Reading time ~1 minute

I’m suddenly a huge fan of text files. Blogging w/ just text files – why is that so cool? For some reason, it really is. I first got started playing around with jekyll and then learned about course-in-a-box both of which made me think that static is the new dynamic, for real.

Not that it is all text. I just learned that if you can make this happen, too:

What’s next after that? Maybe more text?

  • Git
  • xml
  • markdown & more markdown

and then, maybe, these, too:

  • Social Science Specialization
  • Date Mining Specialization

markdowntext Like Tweet +1

Text is fantastic.
